Class GameFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • GameFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    (c) 2012 Bohde Productions Inc. All Rights Reserved. This class creates the main interface used to play the game. It contains the menus and code structure to manage the players money throughout the casino and dealing with switching games, creating games, and quitting games.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • cash

        public static int cash
        Your current money. Initialized to 1000, reset to 1000 every time a new game is created via the menu bar.

      • inGame

        public static boolean inGame
        States whether you are currently playing a game. Used to prevent users from clicking Game --> Sit At A Table in the middle of a hand.

    • Method Detail

      • resetMenus

        public static void resetMenus()
        Used to reset menu items disabled during gameplay

      • boot

        public static void boot()
        Kicks the user out of the casino if they are bankrupt.

      • bankrupt

        public static void bankrupt()
        Kicks the user out of the casino if they bankrupt the casino. cash will overflow to a negative value.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)

      • createNewGame

        private void createNewGame()
        Prompts user to choose the game they'd like to play, and calls respective methods to create that game.

      • saveGame

        private void saveGame()
        Saves the users current amount of money into a file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        fatal()

      • loadGame

        private void loadGame()
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Loads the users saved amount of money from file, and sets cash to that amount. Also resets the main screen, exiting whatever table the user is sitting at, for safety.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        fatal()

      • fatal

        private void fatal()
        In case the Java Gods attack. Displays message to user and then terminates program instantly.
